official_title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week in each year in which Veterans Day is observed as Love America Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the President to proclaim the week in which Veterans Day is observed each year as "Love America Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week in each year in which Veterans Day is observed as Love America Week.
